introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Where Every Tattoo Tells a Story Worth Keeping
introduction.paragraph: At TRUE INK TATTOO, we believe tattoos are more than body art — they are personal narratives, emotional milestones, and lifelong reminders of what matters most.
introduction.vision_text: To become Vietnam's leading artistic tattoo studio — a trusted destination for those seeking meaningful, custom tattoos that reflect their inner world.
introduction.mission_text: To honor every story through high-quality, safe, and expressive tattoos, while creating a welcoming, creative space where art meets authenticity.
values: Purposeful art – Each design carries intent and personal character.
Uncompromising quality – From consultation to aftercare, excellence is our standard.
Creative freedom – We never copy designs. Your tattoo is uniquely yours.
Safety & privacy – Client hygiene and comfort are our top priorities.
Emotional connection – We listen, feel, and translate your story into art.
